Thin material. True to size.

Shirt is super comfy and holds up well after multiple washes. Although I love the longevity that polyester gives as well as the fact that it doesn't shrink, COTTON (which is what this is) doesn't pull when pet claws (cats) accidentally get into the material. Shirt has stretched a little after washing with fabric softener but still looks/feels new.
Excelente Servicio , llego a tiempo el producto y en perfectas condiciones , muchas gracias
Got Navy and it was truly Navy! True to size for a 2xL tall, light weight but perfect for winter wear, he loved it!

Not what it looks like, it is Temu quality, made in China Very thin material, I think it should advertise things MADE IN CHINA, of lesser quality

I was a little nervous when I first received this shirt, because I came out of the package extremely wrinkly. But after the first washing that cleared right up as you can see in the attached images. Build quality is decent. There is a loose thread here or there, but nothing unusual. The material is thin and light. The color and cut looks very much like you'd expect from the listing. And it fits as I expected. Decent value for the money.
I'm 6', 200lbs and wear a size XL in t-shirts and other pull overs. This shirt in an XL was skin-tight. Returned.

评论概述: Were these made in a factory that only hires blind individuals?
评论详情: Wow.! Can't say I've disliked a product as much as these Henley shirts.  Fabric is cheap. Sewing is poor quality and colors don't match the website.  The "Wine Red" is REEEDDDD! in real life while the photo is burgundy looking.  The Army Green looks brown, where's the green?  Can't see how the price is justified given these must be the cheapest shirts I've ever seen that go for over $20.  Bought some henley long sleeve from Liberty Pro (on Amazon) and they are heads and shoulders better and those were 3 for $42.  Skip these!
I saw a review that said it was longer so I went for it but it was not and the material is sooo thin.

Ordering clothing online is often challenging. I like these shirts, I like henley's in general. For the fall and winter months I prefer a heavier weight cotton or blend material. This is light to mid weight so it wouldn't likely be on the top of my pile to wear on a regular daily basis. It is, however, nice and comfortable to wear to bed on a chilly evening. Nice color, button placket is a little thin but overall sizing is normal/consistent. Recommended

评论概述: One of my new favorite shirts
评论详情: Pros:  - Perfect for the fall - great tshirt replacement - Can be dressed up or casual - Color is nice - Gives a worn in feel. Cozy - Didn't shrink in the wash - Fits great and I'm a bigger guy  Cons:  - Need more colors. I'll buy them all!
Nothing
This is just a good product. The quality is not the best.
I really like this henley. Got it for my husband and I think he looks great in it. the fabric is really soft. It is a lighter weight shirt, more for fall/spring.
Good fit overall a good shirt but not what was pictured, somewhat disappointed.

Men's Henley Shirts Casual Basic Long Sleeve T-Shirt Classic Button Solid Lightweight Cotton. This is a really nice looking shirt. It is very comfortable. The size is right on the money. Nice deep , rich green color with cool brown accents. The price is great as well. True to size so order accordingly.  Recommend

This Henley shirt is very stylish and comfortable, with a classic button design that makes it versatile for casual wear. The material is thin, so it’s not meant for warmth, but I personally like the lightweight feel. It's perfect for layering or wearing alone in milder weather. Overall, a great basic piece to have in the wardrobe!

I immediately fell in love with the styling, feel, and aesthetic of this shirt. The material and craftsmanship are outstanding! When shopping for clothes online, I thoroughly inspect everything—symmetry, stitching, size accuracy, care instructions, and even the quality of the buttons. This shirt earns a solid 5 stars because it not only matches the description perfectly but also looks and feels fantastic! The fabric is strong yet soft and smooth, offering a great balance of quality and affordability. I particularly appreciate the various color tones, which initially caught my eye. I'm very pleased with the quality, feel, and appearance of this shirt; both the product and the seller come highly recommended!
nice color and soft

Well, don't expect that you are going to have a similar look and feel of what you see from the product photos after you putting it on. It's looks completely different after I putting it on. Overall, its quality is fairly good. feels comfortable. However, that's pretty much it. Don't get fooled by their product photos. lol

This is a nice super soft and comfortable fall shirt. I am a medium in most men's clothing and this fit that billing. I think it could be great as a base layer or a shirt all by itself. I would get it again with confidence.

评论概述: Good stitching, glad I got 1 size larger. Good as a base layer, or stand alone.
评论详情: I'm 6'2 and weigh about 180 pounds. I can usually get away with ordering a 'large' but to be on the safe side, and especially if the shirt is long sleeve like this one, I go one size up. XL for me, this shirt, fits very well.  Marketed as a light weight shirt, and it is... I would have probably taken 1 star off otherwise. It is basically t-shirt thickness. My wife says it looks good on me, I like the detail on the buttons and the multi-tone collar. I am 'marginally' concerned about long term wear and tear, I live out on a ranch and go through shirts... I will likely use this as a base layer during the fall and spring seasons. It is great for that as well as just a good shirt overall, all by itself. I wouldn't be upset to pay full price for this one. I also don't normally give out 5 stars, but this one hit all the right requirements and earned it.

Even though it arrived quite wrinkled, this is a very nice, attractive Henley shirt.  It is a thin fabric, perfect for autumn or spring. It fits me quite well. One small quibble: there are no tags on this shirt with washing instructions. It’s not a big deal as we will wash it as any other cotton shirt, but instructions would have been nice.

This shirt is really soft and looks great with khaki pants.  My husband thought it looked worn and kinda shabby on the hanger, but I convinced him to give it a try and once he put it on under his fisherman's sweater, he could see for himself how nice it looks. The material has a heavily washed (and loved) look about it.  The buttons on the front are small and sorta hard to button up, but he usually wears it with the bottom two fastened and the top button undone, I think snaps would have been easier, but I haven't seen as many snap fastenings the last few years, maybe they have fallen out of favor.  I washed this on warm with a load of like colored shirts and pants, then dried it on warm for 45 minutes, it came out even softer and wrinkle/crease free.  Some more thoughts; the shoulders fit well. The sleeves are a good length for my 5"10" husband. None of the stitching is unravelling nor is it itchy.  This is a nice addition to my husband's winter wardrobe.

The Men's Henley Shirts Casual Basic Long Sleeve T-Shirt in navy has a few aspects that fell short of my expectations. The collar neck area is a bit loose, which affects the overall look, and the collar itself is thinner than it appears in the photos. I think a thicker, more defined collar would add a nice contrast to the shirt’s style. On the positive side, the fabric is lightweight and thin, making it comfortable for layering or mild weather. However, I’d prefer a sturdier feel in both the collar and fabric for a sharper look.

This Henley shirt is perfectly comfortable and nicely stylish. I was a tad afraid that the cord styling around the neck and shoulders would stand out too much and be too prominent and look a bit silly, but instead it blends in quite well. The material is thin and light weight, but not cheap. It is a Henley for late spring or early fall, a time when there is a chill, but not quite cold yet. Since this is a Chinese product, fit is always an issue. I measure 51.5" in the chest, weigh 215 and stand 6'3" tall, the 2XL fit me perfectly. Overall, quite pleased with this shirt.  ************** VINE Notice ************************  Even though I have been given this product as part of a VINE review by Amazon, my reviews are honest and not influenced by receiving the product. Quite frankly, I could buy this if I wanted it, and I am doing these reviews for fun. I am a 65 year old guy and have appreciated the very clear and detailed reviews on Amazon. I started leaving my own and was selected to give these for products that I wanted to look into. But I will call a dog a dog.  *************** Explanation of Rating System *************************  My rating system.  1 star - terrible. I wouldn't consider buying it.  2 stars - marginal at best. Doesn't meet the minimum requirements or quality to be useful. Buy it at your own risk.  3 stars - average. Meets the quality and requirements for a product of this type but is nothing out of the ordinary. If the price is good, I'd probably buy it.  4 stars - better than average. Exceeds the typical quality of a product of this type and has a few extra features not usually found on other products of this type. I'd buy it.  5 stars - exceptional - far exceeds the quality of products of this type. Hard to beat the quality and features included. Best value for the money. I wouldn't hesitate to buy it..

评论概述: The perfect, soft silky pajama set
评论详情: This shirt paired with the pants as shown may not work as well individually as athletic gear, but they managed to work very well together as sleepwear. Soft and well-made, unusual colors together make a wonderful palette for anybody looking for soft comfort while they slumber. Run a slight bit large to size but that’s perfect if you’re using these for sleepwear.

评论概述: Look at ALL of the ads pictures
评论详情: You can tell from the pictures that the thread is visible on this product, which I was aware of. My only complaint is that in the first three pictures, the thread appears to be the same color as the shirt. After receiving the item, I noticed that while the thread along the cuffs and waist matches the shirt, the thread along the top of the arms and neck does not. Apparently, the fourth picture in the ad does show this. The shirt looks fine, and the size is good—neither too tight nor too loose, a typical cut. It has a bit of a SHEIN quality vibe, so my advice is not to pay too much for it.

There is nothing exceptional about the Qekoma Men’s Henley shirt. It’s a rather thin, basic, long sleeve t-shirt that isn’t as flattering as outlined on the website. The stitches that outline the shoulders doesn’t enhance the look, it actually makes it look worthless. The fit is true to size but that’s the only good quality about it.  I feel, at the most, I’ll wear this to sleep if it enhances my skin.

This long-sleeved T-shirt has a casual yet stylish two-tone color. The fabric is thin and feels great against the skin, so it can be worn in any season. My husband usually wears similar T-shirts, so he's happy with this slightly different design.

Lightweight - so it's good for warmer and cooler days (roll sleeves up) ... feels like a T, but looks a tad more dressy (than a T at least). Not blousy but rather snug and flattering. Did not seem shrink that much in the laundry (despite being all cotton), so overall this is a pretty quality shirt.
This is avery nice shirt. It fits well per the sizing chart.

评论概述: What does 100% cotton blend mean?  Anyway it fits well and is comfortable.
评论详情: I ordered this because it said "100% cotton" then I noticed that on the next line it says "blend".  So "100% cotton blend", what's that?That said the fabric seems comfortable, not too thin, and it fits well and true to size.  The color is nice.  It will be useful for us.  Just read carefully!

This long sleeved t-shirt really fits the bill. It's perfect for a cool day. The fabric is super comfortable. The shirt itself is devil-may-care casual. It looks good left out or tucked in. There's not much else you can ask from a t-shirt. Thumbs up!

评论概述: Similar to what you see in the photos, but the accent stitching is not the same
评论详情: The fabric is regular t-shirt weight and stretchy. I ordered my usual size and find it fits well and, as a person of height, I particularly appreciate that the sleeves are long enough. The tailoring is alright.  I ordered the “wine-red” color: what I received is much redder than what I see in the product photos, but I’m not complaining because I quite like it (note: it’s NOT the color seen in the photo I attached either—blame my phone’s camera). As I suspected I would and hoped that I wouldn’t, I’m less than thrilled with the aesthetic choice to make the stitching a design element—if it looked like it does in the product photos, I’d like it better, but it doesn’t. In my photo you can see the stitches are more far more widely spaced than advertised (the stitching at the top of the photo is where the arms are attached to the body).  Disclosure: I received this product for “free”—in quotes because the IRS requires I pay federal income tax on the retail value. This review is honest and uncensored by the seller.]

I am not very familiar with this seller but I am DEFINITELY looking forward to seeing more from them! I was instantly a fan of the styling, feel and aesthetic of this shirt. The material, details and attention to detail on this shirt are just excellent! My first step in getting clothes online is to go over them with a fine tooth comb; symmetry, stitching, size-accuracy, care instructions, the quality of the buttons, literally every part... and this get's 5 Stars because it is not only precisely as advertised but it looks and feels great! The fabric is strong but soft but smooth, and it's definitely the happy combination of a decent price point married with great quality and care. TL;DR I'm very happy with the quality, feel and appearance of this shirt; this product and seller are easy to recommend.

This men's Henley shirt has quickly become a favorite of mine. The soft, lightweight fabric offers excellent stretch, making it super comfortable. The classic three-button design adds just the right style without feeling overdone. I love pairing it with jeans or layering it under a coat for a more polished look. It’s perfect for casual outings, and the fit is spot-on.
True to size. Cool style. Soft fabric.

This is a VERY attractive shirt on my husband. He is 6’2” and has trouble finding shirts that are long enough for his torso, without having to size way up for that messy, slouchy shouldered look and this shirt is it! He is 195lbs, 6’2” and the XL fits great. Washed up nicely on cool-casual and tumble dry on low without shrinkage. The cotton feels smooth to the touch and elevates the style to look nice enough to wear out to dinner.

I don’t see too many shirts like this on vine, anyway, was glad to review it , if you wear shirts with sleeves pushed up , this you will most likely be into, the flair around the v neck area is different in a good way and it’s comfortable
